The voting for the preliminaries had reached an end.%K%P
The results would be announced at 3pm\non stage in Akihabara.%K%P
The three of us decided to head there\nto see the results with our own eyes.%K%P
'Look at all these people...'%K%P
'I never imagined there would be quite a crowd.'%K%P
It was just proof that the preliminaries\nwere a hot event.%K%P
'Hey, look! It's L☆SEVEN!'%K%P
'There's my sister...'%K%P
Her sister looked a bit like her.%K%P
As center, Sara took the mic and stepped forward.%K%P
'Hi everyone, I'm Sara Benzaiten of L☆SEVEN.'%K%P
'I want to thank all of you for coming here today. \nNow, please allow me to announce the winners of the\npreliminary round of auditions for our new member.'%K%P
She unrolled the paper in her hand and read off it.%K%P
'Starting off in 5th place, with 158,257 votes... \nKagura Amauzu!'%K%P
'Wait... Was that me?'%K%P
'It was! You made it!'%K%P
'Congrats Kagura. Looks like you beat me to it.'%K%P
'Woohoooo! Thank you!'%K%P
She started crying out of pure joy.%K%P
It seemed like lots of her fans had gathered,\nand all of them were clapping for her.%K%P
Next came 4th place, then 3rd.%K%P
Shuri's name still hadn't come up.%K%P
6th place and below still hadn't been\nannounced, so everyone was tense.%K%P
'Next up, 2nd place! With 233,480 votes... \nShuri Kisshouten!'%K%P
'No way...'%K%P
She stood there, blown away.%K%P
Up on stage her sister seemed quite surprised, too.%K%P
'You did it, Shuri.'%K%P
'Congrats. Looks like we both made it!'%K%P
'Th-Thanks you guys... This doesn't even feel real!'%K%P
She was still having trouble taking it all in\nand stood there kind of lost.%K%P
Meanwhile...\nthe 1st place winner was announced.%K%P
They beat out Shuri by around 10,000 votes. \nIt was quite close when you think about\nhow well known they were.%K%P
'These five winners will compete in the audition\nfinals. The finals will be held here on this stage\nin one month's time.'%K%P
There was only a month left until finals.%K%P
It was going to be one month of work\ntrying to get a level beyond the competition.%K%P
'Lastly, I have an announcement\nfor all of the L☆SEVEN fans out there.'%K%P
'After these auditions are over and done with, I,\nSara Benzaiten, will be retiring as a Divine Idol.'%K%P
After making her announcement ever so softly,\nSara put down the mic and walked off stage.%K%P
It looked like Sara was the one who\nleft everyone in awe that afternoon.%K%P
